markdownRemark.excerpt: First read this Subrata Mitra and Prashanth Prakash of Erasmic Ashish Gupta of HelionVC, is to focus on early-stage deals in India (not seed stage) Alok Mittal…
markdownRemark.html:
First read this

  • Subrata Mitra and Prashanth Prakash of Erasmic
  • Ashish Gupta of HelionVC, is to focus on early-stage deals in India (not seed stage)
  • Alok Mittal of Canaan Partners (pronounced K-nun) (focusses on IT and Healthcare technologies)
  • Startup Jobs @ VentureWoods
  • Startup Core Teams @ VentureWoods
  • Stanford U’s EdCorner - Entrepreneurship videos, podcasts and more.
  • Matrix Partner’s $150M India fund - managed by Avnish Bajaj, former founder/CEO of Bazee.com
  • Technology Entrepreneur Promotion Program of the Govt. of India (via Ideaxprofit)
  • Ramneek Gupta (rgupta@battery.com or skypeid: ramneekgupta) of Battery Ventures
  • Startups in Need  - I like to call them “startup enablers”
  • Band of Angels - India - Now known as India Angel Network (IAN)
  • Global Entrepreneurship Network - an initiative by my alma mater, IIT Mumbai

frontmatter.title: George's Question: Of threads and cores
